scripts.yc:update-gateway: yc serverless api-gateway update --id d5dfdjso9in9g25dtq1d --spec serverless/openapi.yaml
scripts.yc:deploy-broadcast: yc serverless function version create --function-id d4ejhm2g0uicn7g0dtcn --runtime nodejs22 --entrypoint index.handler --memory 1g --execution-timeout 60s --service-account-id aje7rv6fp17nfo1o1h15 --source-path serverless/wsbroadcast
scripts.deploy: npm run yc:deploy-broadcast && npm run yc:update-gateway
